about_the_game:
Explore endless mazes, unlock mysterious treasures!

"Maze Endless" is a challenging adventure casual game that tests your wit and luck. In this endless maze journey, players will experience an unprecedented adventure. Starting from the simplest maze, gradually challenge more complex levels, unravel their mysteries, and find the exit.

Features:

1. Endless maze challenges: The mazes generated by advanced algorithms ensure that every game is a brand new experience. From simple starting points to complex structures, challenge your intelligence and patience.
2. Mysterious treasures: Starting from the sixth level, players will have the chance to discover mysterious treasure chests in the maze. Unlock the chests to obtain various auxiliary props to help you pass through the levels more easily.
3. Clean visual effects: The game adopts exquisite pixel art style, combined with dynamic lighting effects, creating a unique and charming maze world.

Upcoming features:

1. Leaderboard function: Compete with other players and vie for the highest score!
2. More items and rewards: In addition to the items in the chests, we will introduce more rewards and items to enrich your adventure experience.

Explore the unknown, unlock treasures, and become a true maze explorer!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04 LTS+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0+ Compatible Card. Not compatible with most integrated graphics cards.
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OSX 10.12+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0+ Compatible Card. Not compatible with most integrated graphics cards.
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

name: Maze Endless

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 3.0+ Compatible Card. Not compatible with most integrated graphics cards.
  • Storage: 125 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
